subject: Golf
Ryder Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Strong showings from Keegan Bradley, Phil Mickelson, Bubba Watson and Webb Simpson helped the United States take a lead over Europe at the Ryder Cup at Medinah Country Club.
snippet: Strong showings from Keegan Bradley, Phil Mickelson, Bubba Watson and Webb Simpson helped the United States take a lead over Europe at the Ryder Cup at Medinah Country Club.
